title: 299: Anti-Racism, Spiritual Bypass + Generational Trauma with Devi Brown
itunes:title: 299: Anti-Racism, Spiritual Bypass + Generational Trauma with Devi Brown
description:
This month on Highest Self Podcast we have been diving into anti-racism and doing the deep inner work and we take it to a whole other level with our guest Devi Brown. I ask her all of the questions I’ve heard people too afraid to ask and Devi delivers it with poise, wisdom and fire. We discuss the root cause of racism, the whiteness of the wellness world, why your yoga class may be surrounded by people who only look like you, educating yourself on anti-racism, generational trauma, spiritual bypass and more.

This is such a powerful episode to listen to and share to educate yourself on the deep anti-racism work.

Dive into into your spiritual activist and sacred anger this month with Goddess Sekhmet in RoseGoldGoddesses.com/Sekhmet

Participate in my Discover Your Dharma 10-Day Course, Healing + Embodiment Through Dance Workshop and so much more in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood all about becoming your highest self. Join us today at rosegoldgoddesses.com
